qas.question: What years did Queen Teutra reign?
From where did Illyrians import there weapons and armor?
What type or ornamentation was featured on the Illyrians shilds and war belts?
What tribes inhabited the Balkan Coast?
What tribe covered most of the republic of Macedonia?

context: The west Balkan coast was inhabited by various <a3_0>Illyrian<a3_0/> tribes and kingdoms such as the kingdom of the Dalmatae and of the Ardiaei, who often engaged in piracy under Queen Teuta (reigned <a0_0>231 BC to 227 BCE<a0_0/>). Further inland was the Illyrian Paeonian Kingdom and the tribe of the <a4_0>Agrianes<a4_0/> which covers most of the modern republic of Macedonia. Illyrians on the coast of the Adriatic were under the effects and influence of Hellenisation and some tribes adopted Greek, becoming bilingual due to their proximity to the Greek colonies in Illyria. Illyrians imported weapons and armor from the <a1_0>Ancient Greeks<a1_0/> (such as the Illyrian type helmet, originally a Greek type) and also adopted the ornamentation of <a2_0>Ancient Macedon<a2_0/> on their shields and their war belts (a single one has been found, dated 3rd century BC at modern Selce e Poshtme part of Macedon at the time under Philip V of Macedon).
